name: Emil Regis Rohellec Terzieff
description: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood-drinking freak.

name: Villentretenmerth
description: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws... he's not the best at names.

name: Zoltan Chivay
description: Life without old mates and booze is like a woman without a rump.
